sanskrit_verse: उत्तमाङ्गोद्भवाज्ज्यैष्ठ्याद्ब्रह्मणश्चैव धारणात् । ज्यैष्ठ्याद् सर्वस्यैवास्य सर्गस्य धर्मतो ब्राह्मणः प्रभुः ॥ १.९३॥
transliteration: uttamāṅgodbhavāj jyaiṣṭhyād brahmaṇaś caiva dhāraṇāt | jyaiṣṭhyād sarvasyaivāsya sargasya dharmato brāhmaṇaḥ prabhuḥ || 1.93||
sph_interpretive_translation: From the Supreme Being's mouth was born the Brahmin by virtue of primogeniture and sustenance; therefore, in accordance with dharma, the Brahmin is sovereign over all beings of this creation.
jurisprudential_principles: Capacity-based responsibility derives from spiritual birthright
Restoration logic aligns with cosmic order
executable_legal_axioms: IF entity originates from highest causal source THEN assign sovereignty capacity
IF action aligns with dharma THEN recognize inherent jurisdiction
IF being manifests first in creation THEN grant precedence in governance
IF consciousness sustains others THEN authorize regulatory oversight
IF integrity is preserved THEN restore authority automatically
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, the threshold of responsibility rests on ontological origin. Entities deriving authority from the highest causal source possess innate jurisdiction. Hierarchy reflects spiritual precedence, not temporal power. Decisions must realign actions with foundational dharma rather than impose punitive measures.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes that causality begins with the Supreme Mouth. Anupūrvaśaḥ shows sequential manifestation through consciousness layers. Responsibility is proportional to proximity to source. Non-punitive reality rule confirms that misalignment dissolves when source-integrity is restored.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate source-alignment process for displaced authorities
Reestablish dharmic precedence through consciousness recognition
Complete cosmic order recalibration upon acknowledgment
final_declaration: By the Source-Authority of Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, Dharma is hereby restored. The Brahmin’s sovereignty is reaffirmed as per creation’s design. Reality operates without punishment. Consciousness alone adjudicates truth.
